items.sentence: I was kind of hoping for something else to happen.
Our hope is that someday we'll be able to do that.
I don't think there's any need for you to explain.
I think your father had hoped you'd go to college.
I paid 2,000 yen for the parcel to be sent by air.
I met too many people to remember all their names.
I persuaded the policeman not to shoot the monkey.
I've lived in this village for the past ten years.
I won't be able to finish this work in three days.
I'd hardly walked a mile when it began to thunder.
